property.name: NOTHING
property.shortdesc: Does not use a kinsoku set.

property.name: HARD_KINSOKU
property.shortdesc: Uses the hard or maximum kinsoku set, which includes all Japanese characters that should not begin or end a line.

property.name: SOFT_KINSOKU
property.shortdesc: Uses the soft or weak kinsoku set, which omits from the hard kinsoku set long vowel symbols and small hiragana and katakana characters.

property.name: SIMPLIFIED_CHINESE_KINSOKU
property.shortdesc: Uses the simplified Chinese kinsoku set.

property.name: TRADITIONAL_CHINESE_KINSOKU
property.shortdesc: Uses the traditional Chinese kinsoku set.
